items.content_html:
Some nice neighbors are changing part of their garage into a gym, and said I could buy their metal shelves at a discount.

Of course that means I need to start cleaning up my garage. üôÉ Nope, not posting a picture. Yet. üòÄ

items.content_html: Today at work was “Focus Friday” - and I called it “bug fix Friday’ - I spent the day fixing some bugs that had been annoying me and other people, and then added a small feature I’ve been wanting for a while.. (command + / - to increase / decrease font sizes in the app). It was a great day!
items.content_text: Today at work was "Focus Friday" - and I called it "bug fix Friday' - I spent the day fixing some bugs that had been annoying me and other people, and then added a small feature I've been wanting for a while.. (command + / - to increase / decrease font sizes in the app).  It was a great day!

Oops. It‚Äôs never like a week. ü§™

This was a great book. love seeing the characters back, and adding a new one. On to the last book in the trilogy.

items.content_html:
Well - I might be sick again. Caught the flu or something before Christmas. Was finally feeling better last week, but this afternoon starting feeling very sore and cold.

I‚Äôm hoping it‚Äôs just from working out yesterday. ü§û(not Covid, test was negative)

items.content_html:
Ok - officially switched over my luciendupont.com domain name to this micro.blog instance. I’m loving the speed and features of micro.blog. And I’m really enjoying paying for something that a small team has built over the years :)

I urge you to check it out if you haven’t.
items.content_text:
Ok - officially switched over my [luciendupont.com](https://luciendupont.com/) domain name to this micro.blog instance. I'm loving the speed and features of [micro.blog](http://micro.blog/). And I'm _really_ enjoying paying for something that a small team has built over the years :) 

I urge you to check it out if you haven't.

items.content_html:
I really enjoyed this book - some good traditional sci-fi, with a bit of humor thrown in. Would make a great movie or tv show.

Finished reading: The Bayern Agenda: The Galactic Cold War, Book I by Dan Moren üìö

items.title: Grand Plans‚Ä¶
items.content_html:
My grand plan of cleaning up a lot of code at work during this ‘down’ week has been thwarted by my cough/cold annoyance.. middle of the night amazon order of some drugs I hope to help.

I took the day off so I don’t feel gulty taking a 2 hour nap again.
